title: My Aram IN game music doesnt work... please help and read
body: My in game aram music isn't working for my league of legends. I have my sound on including the music to 100. the weird thing is I can hear the music for summoners rift but not aram. I can hear everything too in aram like the sound effects, any champions voices/deaths/spells, and the announcer but not the aram music. please some one help me.. is there like a file or something for the in game aram music? how do I fix this issue

replies.body: Hi, I have the same problem, but it's only with my account... I tryed hextech repair tool but that didn't work so I reinstaled the game but also that didn't work...

It's possible the sound files are corrupted, preventing them from playing in ARAM. I recommend [running a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) of League's files to ensure this is not the case.

Let me know if a repair caused any change.
it didn't work sadly... :/ I even unistalled then reinstalled league but I still don't have the sound files for it.
Hmm.. I just spoke with one of our tech dudes and they mentioned this may be affecting only this specific account. Can you login to another of your accounts to see if this still happens?
still happens, I think its just this computer that doesn't let me hear the aram music, idk whats wrong.

Yeah, that's really strange that this persists through multiple accounts. I think our tech team may be able to dive into some of your logs and take a deeper look into this.

I suggest running a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [support ticket submission.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
what do i do once i get the lol logs? do I put it in my league?
Create a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with an explanation on your issue and attach the LoL Logs.zip to your ticket.
